column3: Don't modify upstream files, generated files, historical release notes, subtrees or any translations. Remove any @ mentions from the PR body.
Note also there is already this PR in progress of review. https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/20762\n\nThere may well be some to-dos for a follow up PR though.
Concept ACK for any remaining ones after doing https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/20836#issuecomment-753581717 and #20762 -- looks like you found some.
Noisy labels too. A maintainer needs to reduce the Labels to just Docs

<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* #20811 (refactor: move net_processing implementation details out of header by ajtowns)

If you consider this pull reques

Addressing review comments, excluded:

generated files
historical release notes
subtrees
translations.
Thanks for your contribution. However to move things along I'm going to fix this up and consolidate it with some other changes. Your changes will still be attributed to you.
